Package ohos.aafwk.ability.assistance

Interface IAssistanceChannel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AceAbility, AceDataAbility, AceServiceAbility

    public interface IAssistanceChannel
    Provides methods to receive notifications about collaboration session establishment and disconnection returned by the framework to your application.

    When a collaboration session is established, terminated during establishment, or disconnected, the framework notifies your application through the IAssistanceChannel callback.

    When your application calls the Ability#startAssistAbility method to establish a collaboration session, IAssistanceChannel needs to be passed, and the peer ability of the collaboration session needs to implement the IAssistanceChannel API.

    Since:
    7

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onConnected​(AbilityAgent agent)
      Invoked by the framework to notify your application when a collaboration session is established using the Ability#startAssistAbility method.
      void onConnectFailed​(int errorCode)
      Invoked by the framework to notify your application when a collaboration session fails to be established using the Ability#startAssistAbility method.
      void onDisconnected​(int errorCode)
      Invoked by the framework to notify your application when a collaboration session is disconnected.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnected

        void onConnected​(AbilityAgent agent)
        Invoked by the framework to notify your application when a collaboration session is established using the Ability#startAssistAbility method.
        Parameters:
        agent - Indicates the agent of the peer ability.
        Since:
        7

      • onConnectFailed

        void onConnectFailed​(int errorCode)
        Invoked by the framework to notify your application when a collaboration session fails to be established using the Ability#startAssistAbility method.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - Indicates the reason why the collaboration session fails to be established. For details about the error code, see AssistantCode.
        Since:
        7

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected​(int errorCode)
        Invoked by the framework to notify your application when a collaboration session is disconnected.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - Indicates the reason why the collaboration session is disconnected. For details about the error code, see AssistantCode.
        Since:
        7
